price: Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, abiding therein forever. Such is the reward of those who purify themselves[20].
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
